definitions.definition: Widespread, common, prevalent, current (mainly of unpleasant or harmful things).
definitions.example: Smallpox was rife after the siege had been lifted.

definitions.definition: Abounding; present in large numbers, plentiful.
definitions.example: These woodlands are rife with red deer.

definitions.definition: Full of (mostly unpleasant or harmful things).
definitions.example: Many post-colonial governments were rife with lawlessness and corruption.
The snowdrops grow rife on the slopes of Mount Pembroke.
